# duplocloud_s3_bucket (Data Source)

`duplocloud_s3_bucket` retrieves an S3 bucket in a Duplo tenant.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "duplocloud_s3_bucket" "mybucket" {
  tenant_id = "your-tenant-id"
  name      = "mybucket"
}

output "bucket_arn" {
  value = data.duplocloud_s3_bucket.mybucket.arn
}

output "bucket_fullname" {
  value = data.duplocloud_s3_bucket.mybucket.fullname
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) The short name of the S3 bucket.
- `tenant_id` (String) The GUID of the tenant that the S3 bucket resides in.

### Read-Only

- `allow_public_access` (Boolean) Whether or not public access is allowed.
- `arn` (String) The ARN of the S3 bucket.
- `default_encryption` (List of Object) Default encryption settings for objects uploaded to the bucket. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--default_encryption))
- `domain_name` (String) The domain name of the S3 bucket.
- `enable_access_logs` (Boolean) Whether or not access logs are enabled.
- `enable_versioning` (Boolean) Whether or not versioning is enabled.
- `fullname` (String) The full name of the S3 bucket.
- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
- `managed_policies` (List of String) The managed policies applied to the bucket.
- `region` (String) The region of the S3 bucket.
- `tags` (List of Object) The tags assigned to this S3 bucket. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--tags))

<a id="nestedatt--default_encryption"></a>
### Nested Schema for `default_encryption`

Read-Only:

- `method` (String) Default encryption method.

<a id="nestedatt--tags"></a>
### Nested Schema for `tags`

Read-Only:

- `key` (String)
- `value` (String)
